Reviews.Title: very good buy
Reviews.Author: pate prosser
Reviews.Content: I'm very well pleased, I would not take my money back, I got a very good buy and I'm happy with the service, it was shipped the same day, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for great price!!!
Reviews.Author: Monica D. Gregory "Mrs. Monica Gregory"

} } } Length:: 0:42 MinsThis is a product review for the AOC L19W961. A 19-inch flat screen LCD HDTV. It's a very good tv, with great clarity.

ProductInfo.Features:
1366x768 Resolution
ATSC w/Clear QAM & NTSC Tuner
HDMI, Video, Component, PC Input
12000:1 dynamic contrast ratio
Wall mountable
ProductInfo.Name: AOC L19W961 19-Inch 720p LCD HDTV
